TopicTitle: Bought from Amazon, still no updated version.

Articles.Content:
I've been trying to update my KSP but seeing as I bought from Amazon I am stuck with version 1.0.0. It's crazy that 8 months later I still can't access any updates.

Is there anything that can be done?

Try contacting KSP support I've heard that if you can provide them with proof you bought the game legit they will set you up with a download link or something for the new version. "[email protected]"

That really stinks about Amazon btw, I'm not sure how they get away with that, should be some kind of warning when you buy the game that they aren't going to provide you with any newer versions so your on your own.

Best of luck!

Edited January 19, 2016 by Rocket In My Pocket

Hi bigleadballoon, and welcome aboard.

Please drop an email to [email protected] with your particulars, I believe they've been making alternate arrangements for Amazon buyers who can't update.
Thanks for the responses, I'll contact the support team and see how I get on.
